solution_line_template: From his second job, Mike receives ${second_job_rate}/hour * {second_job_hours} hours = $<<{second_job_rate}*{second_job_hours}={second_job_earnings}>>{second_job_earnings}.
He therefore earned ${total_earnings} – ${second_job_earnings} = $<<{first_job_earnings}={first_job_earnings}>>{first_job_earnings} from his first job.
